title: Thousands of games and I still don't own all the champions
body:
I feel the amount of IP you were getting for the dynamic queue boost is how it should be all the time. It's like RIOT made this IP system to keep people interested in playing the game, but in reality I never look forward to my next champion purchase.

I'm just here wondering why the fuck I don't own every single champion and rune when I have put countless hours into this fucking game
